interestingcomments.content: Is the tripod mount point consistent across the Ms? /!/ Question to those with multiple Ms. I know that the slot on the films M is on the right hand side and off-center on the digital M, but wanted to make sure if its precise location is consistent across each of the mediums.

interestingcomments.content:
Just Received My Grandfather's Leica /!/ &#x200B;

https://preview.redd.it/x0x8sgf3jbt71.jpg?width=3024&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=bb94d5a5c3a4a59d9cf43d3b4b92fd5be6910aee

Hi All,

I just received my Grandfather's Leica which he purchased (I think?) in 1944. It has not been used in many years and I am thinking of refurbishing it to use for future trips to various locations. Also, it seems like an excellent camera to start learning photography in a deeper way. 

Do you have any advice about getting this antique camera refurbished? How do you think the potential quality of the pictures would be compared to a more modern DSLR (< $1,000)?
